title: Romance
description: Although deeply in love with her boyfriend — and indeed sleeping in the same bed with him — a schoolteacher cannot handle the almost complete lack of intimacy he will allow. Increasingly frustrated, she gradually finds her sexual appetites leading her into ever more risky situations, including a developing one with the headmaster.

reviews.text: Romance... is it really any romance in this?First of all is an French art house film that contains explicit sex scenes, but of course, one of the actors is an porn actor!!! what can you expect?The story... where to begin besides that is really slow to the point that get boring after a while. The story consist of a girl named Marie played by Caroline Ducey who's boyfriend refuses to have sex with her, so, she goes looking for a series of sexual encounters until she engaged into sadomasochism... wait... is this Fifty shades of Grey? well... no... but that part of the movie reminds me to it.The acting... well... it's boring, actors look and sound like if they didn't want to be there, so, that's a bad sign, right?It's not exactly a bad film, it has it's moments but the slow pacing and boring acting make it plain tedious, aparently the only parts of the film that look a bit more interesting are the sex scenes even if they are explicit and make you feel uncomfortable.
